segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the water, but she's just calmly drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so bold, climbing up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit scared for him, that stool doesn't look safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame they're all stuck inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, it's going to be a big cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the children have been taking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the mess soon, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
